settings.heading: Where Trust Meets Timeless Elegance
settings.content:
At Marc Robinson Jewelers, we believe buying fine jewelry should feel just as safe online as it does in person. For decades, our family business has been known for craftsmanship, integrity, and genuine care – values we proudly carry into every piece we create and every customer we serve.

With established locations across Texas – in Round Rock, Austin, Dallas, and Tyler – and internationally in Mississauga, Canada, we proudly serve both our local communities and customers around the world. Now, with our new online experience, we bring the same safety, quality, and personal service you’d expect in-store directly to your home.

settings.heading: The Marc Robinson Standard
settings.content:
Choosing fine jewelry is personal – and it should always feel safe and unforgettable. That’s why we don’t just sell jewelry; we build trust that lasts a lifetime.

  • Authenticity You Can Trust – Every diamond and gemstone is GIA- or IGI-certified, with honesty and transparency in every detail.
  • Made to Last – Every piece is hand-selected or custom-crafted to the highest standards. From luxury timepieces to heirloom-quality designs, we ensure each detail reflects precision, beauty, and lasting value.
  • Care That Continues – From complimentary cleanings and inspections to guaranteed watch service, we stand by your jewelry long after you take it home.
  • A Lifetime Promise – We back all our gold and silver jewelry with a lifetime warranty against manufacturing defects.
  • Shop with Confidence – With secure shipping, online returns, and flexible financing, every step of your journey is simple and worry-free.

At Marc Robinson Jewelers, our promise is simple:
We stand behind every piece, every time.
